message.content: I can see the cache invalidation issue. The cache is only invalidated if new items are found, but the feed properties (name, url) have changed regardless. Let me fix this:

function.name: str_replace_editor

content:
The file /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py has been edited. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py:
   877	        
   878	        db.session.commit()
   879	        
   880	        # Invalidate cache for the feed's tab, as feed properties (name, url) have changed.
   881	        invalidate_tab_feeds_cache(feed.tab_id)
   882	        logger.info(f"Cache invalidated for tab {feed.tab_id} after updating feed {feed.id}.")
   883	
   884	        # Trigger update to fetch new items.
   885	        try:
   886	            fetch_and_update_feed(feed.id)
   887	        except Exception as update_e:
   888	            # Log error during update but don't fail the operation
   889	            logger.error(f"Error updating feed {feed.id} after URL change: {update_e}", exc_info=True)
   890	        
   891	        logger.info(f"Updated feed {feed_id} from '{original_url}' to '{new_url}'.")
   892	        
   893	        # Return full feed data including items for frontend to update widget
   894	
Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

extras.new_content:
# Invalidate cache for the feed's tab, as feed properties (name, url) have changed.
        invalidate_tab_feeds_cache(feed.tab_id)
        logger.info(f"Cache invalidated for tab {feed.tab_id} after updating feed {feed.id}.")

        # Trigger update to fetch new items.
        try:
            fetch_and_update_feed(feed.id)
        except Exception as update_e:
            # Log error during update but don't fail the operation
            logger.error(f"Error updating feed {feed.id} after URL change: {update_e}", exc_info=True)
extras.diff:
--- /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py
+++ /workspace/SheepVibes/backend/app.py
@@ -880 +880,5 @@
-        # Trigger update to fetch new items
+        # Invalidate cache for the feed's tab, as feed properties (name, url) have changed.
+        invalidate_tab_feeds_cache(feed.tab_id)
+        logger.info(f"Cache invalidated for tab {feed.tab_id} after updating feed {feed.id}.")
+
+        # Trigger update to fetch new items.
@@ -882,4 +886 @@
-            success, new_items = fetch_and_update_feed(feed.id)
-            if success and new_items > 0:
-                invalidate_tab_feeds_cache(feed.tab_id)
-                logger.info(f"Cache invalidated for tab {feed.tab_id} after updating feed {feed.id}.")
+            fetch_and_update_feed(feed.id)
